entry.title: New release for Beaver Habit Tracker: v0.7.0
entry.content:

Hightlights

This release introduces a context menu feature that allows users to manage habits through right clicks on desktop or long presses on mobile devices

Changes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/daya0576/beaverhabits/compare/v0.6.2...v0.7.0

âœ¨ New Features

  • Added context menu for habit management in home page
  • Added experimental support for image attachments in notes
  • Added support for adding notes via streaks

ğŸ’¡ Enhancements

  • Enhanced note display with total days counter label
  • Implemented automatic saving for notes

ğŸ Bugfixes
